item.title: closed note (near Óhegy, 10th district) / * 2022 September 23 05:28 ITineris Created: A Vaspálya utcát pontosan mettől-meddig nevezték most át Richter Gedeon utcává? / * 2022 September 30 04:21 vasony Resolved: - 42151/8 hrsz.-ú közterület, a Vaspálya utca Kőér utca és Noszlopy utca közötti szakasza Richter Gedeon utca / - 42151/10 hrsz.-ú közterület, a Vaspálya utca Noszlopy utca és Sibrik Miklós utca közötti szakasza Robert Bosch utca

closed note (near Hárshegy, 2nd district) / * 2022 September 28 19:57 Mateusz Konieczny Created: https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/2425964018 / Is there drinking water available here or not? It can be water fountain, water tap, maybe even hand pump, spring and so on. / It is marked as / amenity = drinking_water / disused:amenity = drinking_water / so it is marked as both active and disused at the same time. / If it is closed during winter then seasonal=yes would be much better / * 2022 September 29 07:17 Petró Tamás Resolved: It works only in summer (it closed in winter). We don't know the exact time when it change.

new note (near Dömös) / * 2022 September 28 19:57 Mateusz Konieczny Created: https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/2733389656 / Is there drinking water available here or not? It can be water fountain, water tap, maybe even hand pump, spring and so on. / It is marked as / amenity = drinking_water / disused:amenity = drinking_water / so it is marked as both active and disused at the same time. / If it is closed during winter then seasonal=yes would be much better
